attributes.action: make all types of business to turn off  lighting  at there time of closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: there are too many businesses leaving on lighting that is of no importance over night,this could be advertising or internal lights.We do not just meaning major industrial and retail powers but also individual retailers.This could then lead to a reduction of the countries energy needs and a reduction of CO2 EMMISSIONS
